always @(posedge clk) begin
	if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
		cs <= 'hff;
	end else if (inst_d1 == CMD_CHIPSELECT && cs_sleep_counter_compare == 1'b1) begin
		cs <= cmd_d1[NUM_CS-1:0];
	end
end
